pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Tools for Forecasting // Tidies up the forecasting modeling and prediction work flow, extends the 'broom' package with 'sw_tidy', 'sw_glance', 'sw_augment', and 'sw_tidy_decomp' functions for various forecasting models, and enables converting 'forecast' objects to "tidy" data frames with 'sw_sweep'.
